title: AI-Based Self-Directed e-Learning Design and LMS Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course combining AI-enhanced virtual learning environments with self-directed learning strategies to strengthen practical language education

learning_goals: Learners can explain a learner-customized content design process using AI analysis tools.
Learners can propose three operational strategies to promote self-directed learning after analyzing LMS functionalities.
Learners can create improvement plans for e-learning modules based on formative assessment data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
